segments.text: Oh , hi , Jessica , are you going to see this movie too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to , the movies are smash hit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't . I'm waiting for Paul , but he's late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll say the movie's starting in the minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I wonder what's keeping him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looks like he won't show up . He's done this before , hasn't he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's he trying to pull anyway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . But this is definitely the last straw .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you should start seeing someone else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You said it . Ok , let's go in , Sandy .
segments.speaker: S2
